skill.Name: Stealth
skill.Description: You are skilled at being stealthy and taking advantage of not being perceived.

power.Name: Light Footed
power.Description: Activated; You gain the ability to make a concerted effort to conceal your presence and actions.

power.Name: Act Natural
power.Description: Alerts for which you're the source cool off twice as fast.

power.Name: Hide
power.Description: Activated; You gain the ability to hide while actively persued. Hiding lowers the maximum roll to perceive you.

power.Name: Sleight Of Hand
power.Description: Your actions are half as visually obvious.

power.Name: Sap
power.Description: Activated; While light footed, you gain the ability to render a creatures unconscious.

power.Name: Pickpocket
power.Description: Activated; While light footed, you gain the ability to take items weighing {{K|5#}} or less from adjacent creatures.

power.Name: Sneak Attack
power.Description: While light footed, your primary short blade attacks gain +2 penetrations.

power.Name: Shameless
power.Description: While light footed, your actions are half as psionically obvious and the base movement speed penalty is negated.

power.Name: Master Of Shadows
power.Description: While light footed, all your actions are less obvious proportionate to how many potential witnesses there are.
